quote: Take the attitude of a student. Never be too big to ask questions. Never know too much to learn something new. – Og Mandino
fact: The value of Pi will be officially "rounded down" to 3.14 from 3.14159265359 on December 31, 1999.
joke: What do you call a bee that lives in America? A USB.
